page.title: 07Darwen Leisure Centre
page.content: At the leisure centre there are lots of things to do:badminton,tennis, squash,swimming,trampolining,table tennis,roller skating,basketball, indoor bowls,weight lifting,cricket and football.There is also a sauna, solarium and a cafe.There are seperate changing rooms for the swimmers and people using the sports hall. Originally,the building was just a Public baths,and swimming is still the most popular activity.There are two pools,a small one for learners,and a large pool.At weekends activities for children are organised.On three evenings Darwen Swimming Club meet,and sometimes there is water polo. Most of the other sports take place in the sports hall,and have to be booked in advance_it would be rather difficult to play badminton and football at the same time!
